price: Those who believe and do righteous deeds, the Most Compassionate will endear them [to His creation][26].
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا
footnotes: [26] And He will love them as well.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
